group_1.narration: Kamihama City...@A strange place where Witches gather.
And since Magical Girls naturally come to@hunt them, there're always battles unfolding.
A city of Witches and Magical Girls.@Strangeness on top of strangeness...

group_1.textCenter: Well, that's what Mami said, but hey!@What do I care?
I found myself a good huntin' spot.@Time to get some Grief Seeds.

group_1.narration: Accordin' to Mami, all ya gotta do is go@out for a walk and you'll run into a Witch.
That's how nuts this place is…

group_1.textCenter: My Soul Gem is goin' off!@That was fast! Time to get to work!

group_1.textLeft: Mami sure was right! This'll be a snap!
Huh? Oh, never mind.@It's just a Familiar's Labyrinth.
Hmph... What a waste of time...
蝨＊溷慍‡繧［］貞ｮ医ｌ

group_1.textRight: It-it's strong... But... I'm not about@to lose here!

group_1.textCenter: She's havin' trouble takin' down a Familiar?
I just have to keep up the pressure to@beat it!

group_1.textRight: Hey, you! What the hell are ya doin'?

group_1.textLeft: Errr... Ummm...
C-could you let me through?@The Familiar is going to...

group_1.textRight: Is there somethin' wrong with your eyes?
That's not a Witch, that's a Familiar.
You don't kill a hen before it has time to@lay an egg!

group_1.textLeft: Huh?
Ah, the Labyrinth! ...[chara:302500:lipSynch_0][wait:1.2][chara:302500:cheek_0][chara:302500:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:302500:lipSynch_1]Ugh, it got away...

group_1.textRight: You an amateur? Sure, there're lotsa Witches,@but that doesn't mean you should waste 'em!

group_1.textLeft: Waste them…?
But a Familiar could become a malicious@Witch someday...
Ummm, a malicious Witch is...well...
They're Witches that...ummm spread@hatred and malice among people.
All the evil and spite in the world...@They're the main source of it.
Because of them people can't escape@from malice…
Hatred…violence…and bullying…
So I've sworn to myself that@I'll destroy them.

group_1.textRight: I sorta understand what you're tryin'@to say, but...
Are you one of those wannabe justice@crusaders?
Was becomin' a Magical Girl some@kind of joke to you or somethin'?
I hate people that mess around and stick@their noses in other people's business.

group_1.textLeft: No...it's not a joke... And I'm not@messing around.
...I'm serious...dead serious!@I will defeat them!
The Witches...the Familiars that@become them...I will...I will!
They must not be allowed to cause@another tragedy ever again!

group_1.textRight: So tell me then...what was it?
Why do you hate Witches so much?
Was your family killed by one or somethin'?

group_1.textLeft: No...not my family...
I was killed by one.
